title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 § 680.11 - Physical environment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 § 680.11 - Physical environment

State Regulations
(a) Issuance of
an operating certificate by the OPWDD shall be dependent upon the facility
meeting environmental standards prescribed by the Department of Health for
medical treatment and health-related services which are provided to individuals
whether or not they have a developmental disability. (b) A waiver may be obtained from the OPWDD
for requirements of medical and health-related services which are not
appropriate to the individuals served or are provided through a contractual
agreement by another agency. Notes

(a) Issuance of an operating certificate by OPWDD shall be dependent upon the facility meeting environmental standards prescribed by the Department of Health for medical treatment and health-related services which are provided to individuals whether or not they have a developmental disability. (b) A waiver may be obtained from OPWDD for requirements of medical and health-related services which are not appropriate to the individuals served or are provided through a contractual agreement by another agency.
